description: Test configurations for Plan→Realize→Repair architecture evaluation

pure_geometric.name: Pure Geometric (No POS Constraints)
pure_geometric.description: Pure geometric flow with waypoint planning and recursive integration but no syntax scaffolding
pure_geometric.notes: May produce geometric flow but could lack grammatical structure

plan_realize_repair.name: Plan→Realize→Repair (Full Architecture)
plan_realize_repair.description: Complete architecture with waypoint planning, recursive integration, and geometric repair. POS constraints used as optional filter.
plan_realize_repair.notes: Should show highest coherence with both geometric and grammatical quality

skeleton_only.name: Skeleton Only (Baseline)
skeleton_only.description: Minimal baseline with no foresight, no thinking, only reactive constraint-based generation
skeleton_only.notes: Baseline performance - should be outperformed by full architecture

comparison_criteria.hypothesis: Plan→Realize→Repair should significantly outperform skeleton-only baseline
